page.title: 11MY NAN IN MELKSHAM
page.content: My nan is an old aged pensioner and a widow. She lives in a council bugalow opposite Lowbourne Junior School, which is my school. My nan's bungalow was built on the old canal in 1981. The foudations are beginning to move and my nan's bungalow is rising. West Wiltshire County Council are coming once a week to measure how much it moves in a month. They have not said what they will do when they know how much it has moved. There are 6 rooms in the bungalow: a lounge, kitchen, bathroom, 2 bedrooms and a spare room. My nan lives in sheltered accommodation. She can pull a cord in any room if she is in trouble and someone will come round immediately. She gets a widow's State Pension of Â£37.74 a week and her rent is Â£32.72 a fortnight.
